mainText:
For all my life I have heard about Steve Jobs as if  he was some changeless
fact of Universe. So it really feels strange to hear he has  passed away
and, though my interest about him has never been beyond my school books, I
feel really sad to know that such a genius and special man is not among us
anymore. Steve Jobs was an alive legend and his departure from this world
surely leaves a sense of emptiness. To his family and friends, I would like
to say that I am sorry and that I wish him to rest in peace.




                                                With all my respect and
 admiration
author: Rafaela
